plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunshine to grow tall.
⚽ You can play on me in the park.
🐄 Animals like to eat me

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes bright colors. People give me to each other when they are happy. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I smell very nice!
💧 I grow from a seed.
🎁 I'm often given as a gift.

plant.question: I grow on a tree, and monkeys love to eat me. I am yellow and yummy. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A monkey likes to eat me.
💛 I am the color of the sun.
🌴 I grow on a tropical tree.

plant.question: I am tall and have a thick trunk. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very big and strong.
🐿️ Squirrels climb on me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall (autumn).

plant.question: I am a vegetable that is long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a crunchy vegetable.
🐰 A bunny enjoys me.
🧡 My color is like a pumpkin.

plant.question: I grow in the water. Ducks like to swim near me and I have big, round leaves that float. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have big green pads on the water.
🐸 Frogs like to sit on my leaves.
💧 You find me in a pond.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers. People say I smell very sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red or pink.
🌵 Be careful of my pointy parts.
💘 People give me as a symbol of love.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with big yellow flowers that look like the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My name has the word sun in it.
🐦 Birds like to eat my seeds.
☀️ I always turn to face the sun.

plant.question: I grow in the ground but I am very hard and crunchy. People often eat me with dips. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I can make you cry when you cut me.
🍔 You can have me on a burger.
⚪ I am usually white or yellow.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside and sweet, juicy inside. I grow in hot, dry places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have lots of spikes!
🏜️ I grow in the desert.
🍉 My fruit can be different colors, but is usually red or yellow inside.

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright and shine in the day, but go away when it's time to play! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm warm and yellow.
👀 You need sunglasses to look at me.
🌱 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock that goes around the Sun, and you live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 💙 I am mostly blue and green from space.
🏠 People build houses on me.
🌳 I have trees and oceans.

cosmos.question: I come out at night, and sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 Some people say I am made of cheese, but that's silly!
🌑 I reflect the Sun's light.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, much bigger than the Earth, and I have a big red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My spot is a storm.
🪐 I am one of the outer planets.
💨 I'm made of gas, not rock.

cosmos.question: I am very far away, and I twinkle in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I look like a tiny light.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.
🔥 I am a giant ball of burning gas, like the sun but much further.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me, made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide.
🪐 I am a planet with many moons.
🧊 My rings are made of icy particles.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture in the sky. What am I called?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them are named after animals.
🌌 You can find them on a star map.
⭐ People have used me for navigation for a long time.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that flies through space. Sometimes I burn up in the Earth's atmosphere and make a shooting star! What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Some people call me a 'falling star'.
💥 I can cause craters on planets.
🪨 I am smaller than a planet or moon.

cosmos.question: I am a giant collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system lives in one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am often spiral-shaped.
🥛 Our one is called the 'Milky Way'.
✨ I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I travel in a special suit, visit the moon and explore the vast universe. Who am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I go to space in a rocket.
🚀 I need a helmet to breathe.
🌕 I sometimes walk on the Moon.
